abstract: Uzbekistan government issues statement announcing hospitalization of Pres Islam Karimov, but offers no details regarding his illness; Karimov has ruled nation for over quarter century and prospect of his decline has raised questions about country's long-term stability.

headline.print_headline: Uzbekistan Says Its Ruler for Decades Is in Hospital
headline.main: Islam Karimov, Uzbekistan’s Longtime Ruler, Is Hospitalized

snippet: The government issued an unusual statement announcing the hospitalization of the 78-year-old president but did not give details about the nature of his illness or his condition....
lead_paragraph: The government issued an unusual statement announcing the hospitalization of the 78-year-old president but did not give details about the nature of his illness or his condition.
